<!-- Do not edit by hand unless you're certain you know what you are doing! -->

The provider type for the nomad package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

### Inputs

The Provider resource accepts the following [input]({{< relref "/docs/intro/concepts/inputs-outputs" >}}) properties:

        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}A path to a PEM-encoded certificate provided to the remote agent; requires use of key_file or key_pem.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">

            title="Optional">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}Consul token to validate Consul Connect Service Identity policies specified in the job file.
{{% /md %}}</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
